::: {style="font-size:70%"}

page tables 1 page; PTE: 3 bit PPN (MSB), 1 valid bit, 4 unused<br/>
page table base register <code>0x08</code>; translate virtual address <code>0x1CB</code>

:::: {.column .solve .fragment fragment-index=2 width="37%"}

0x1CB = 111 001 011<sub>TWO</sub><br/>
PTE 1: 0xFF at 0x0F<br/>
&nbsp;&nbsp;(= base + 111<sub>TWO</sub>)</br>
PTE 1: PPN 111 (7) valid 1
PTE 2: 0x0C at 0x39
PTE 2: PPN 000 (0) valid _0_
_page fault!_
